item.title: Loadmaster’s Nose Cargo Door Latch Annunciator System

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided it is visually verified that latches are fully extended before each departure.

numlitem.para: Prior to each departure, ensure nose cargo door has been verified closed, latched, locked.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel and on Annunciator panel: "LOADMASTER’S NOSE CARGO DOOR ANNUNCIATOR SYS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Log at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Accomplish all normal procedures to ensure door is securely closed, latched and locked.
Visually verify all 16 latches are fully extended by viewing that each latch pin is extended to a position that is within + 0.1 inch of the visible end of the bushing (see illustration below).
